channel.title: CVE Feed for Bitdefender -- EPSecurityService.exe
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Bitdefender -- EPSecurityService.exe

item.title: CVE-2019-17099|2024-09-16T17:02:47.446Z -- bitdefender -- epsecurityservice.exe
item.description: An Untrusted Search Path vulnerability in EPSecurityService.exe as used in Bitdefender Endpoint Security Tools versions prior to 6.6.11.163 allows an attacker to load an arbitrary DLL file from the search path. This issue affects: Bitdefender EPSecurityService.exe versions prior to 6.6.11.163.
